Your company is located in Dongsishitiao, Dongcheng District, Beijing. Jack prefers a house with a nearby park or green space for his daily walks. You expect to rent a house for 2000.0.You still have 2 chances to choose house.    

Up to now, your personal preference for house is :Jack wants a traditional and well-maintained house with a peaceful atmosphere.

response.thought: Considering my family consists of only two people and I prefer a traditional and well-maintained house with a peaceful atmosphere, I believe the middle_house type would be the best fit for us. It can accommodate our family size and meets my preference for a peaceful environment. Additionally, the per capita living area of a middle_house should be suitable for our needs.

log_round.choose_house_type_reason: Based on my personal preference for an open layout and plenty of natural light, I think the small_house may be the best option for me. It is suitable for one person to live alone, which fits my current situation. Additionally, the price of this house type should be within my budget of 1600.0. However, I will also consider the per capita living area to ensure it meets my needs.

prompt_inputs.thought_type: Your views on these house types.
prompt_inputs.choose_type: My choice is (house type, should be one of [large_house,middle_house,small_house])
prompt_inputs.house_info:
There are 3 house types available. The infomation of these house types are listed as follows:
large_house:This type of house can accommodate more than three people.

middle_house:This type of house is suitable for families of two people,and can also accommodate a younger child.

small_house:This type of house is suitable for one person to live alone.
prompt_inputs.thought_hint:
Remember to consider the following things before choosing house:
1. The price of this house type should be within your budget.
2. The per capita living area should be taken into consideration.
3. Remember to give the reason why the selected house type meets your needs in thought(exp. My family has a large population and needs a larger house to live in)

The tall silver pine trees, from which the community gets its name, dot the skyline and provide refreshing shade during the summer months.
